name: Performance Marketing Lead
description:
About the company:

Didi Chuxing - DiDi - is the world’s leading mobile transportation platform. Our mission is to build a better journey. Internationalization is a core strategy of DiDi. We are expanding our services to Greater China, Asia, Africa, Europe, and Latin America. At the same time, the company has formed investment and technology partnerships with Grab, Lyft, Ola, Uber, 99, Taxify, and Careem.

About the job:

The ideal candidate is energetic, structured, self-starter, and an expert at finding growth opportunities. This candidate will work closely with operations, product, finance, and strategy teams to build a process that will speed up marketing projects and analytics. At Didi, we aim to build the most effective growth marketing machine. You will have the early opportunity to lead a crucial team and build the fastest-growing technology company in Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia.

Your Responsibilities:

  • Define and execute the Performance Marketing strategy to achieve the overall business goals

  • Build and develop a world-class performance marketing team

  • Focus on managing budgets to hit targets and communicating with the senior leadership

  • Build a growth engine through processes, frameworks and provide data analysis and insights to the wider marketing team

  • Work with Product, Data Science and Analytics to build foundational capabilities

  • Build a culture of testing, innovation, and iteration

The Successful applicant:

  • 8+ years on hands-on experience managing large budgets (>$10M USD) for performance marketing/growth

  • Good understanding on attribution, measurement, and marketing automation

  • Experience leading a 5+ people team

  • Experience implementing frameworks, processes, and goal setting across teams

  • Ability to contextualize data and communicate clearly

  • Strong stakeholder management and project management skills

  • Great at navigating internal company processes and helping teams to work together

  • Experience in app marketing
